short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that blocks sites to help you to stop procrastination.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an academic project called Astro Focus Kit. It is an app that helps you to deal with web procrastination and lack of focus.

The extension communicates with an web server and watch for websites access to block them for you.

It is a college course project from the Centro Universit√°rio Ritter dos Reis, better known as UniRitter.

The code is open source and can be accessed on:

https://github.com/aloefflerj/astro-focus-kit
https://github.com/aloefflerj/astro-focus-kit-server
https://github.com/aloefflerj/astro-focus-kit-client
https://github.com/aloefflerj/astro-focus-kit-chrome-extension
https://github.com/aloefflerj/astro-focus-kit-env

This extension is a complement to the web application hosted on:
https://astro-focus-kit-client.vercel.app
